description:
A first year student who attends the Senior High School division of Hakuhou Girls` Academy on the planet of Uminoakehoshi (Morning Star of the Sea). A member of the yacht club. She was a normal high school girl with perfect behavior and excellent grades, until suddenly, one day, she is asked to assume the position of captain of a space pirate ship. She has a very bright personality and a lot of friends.
Source: Official Site
name: Katou Marika
